text: Benjamin Franklin was an American patriot, writer, printer, and inventor. During the Revolutionary War he persuaded the French to help the colonists.

front: Who was the first president of the United States?
A tax that the British Pariliament placed on newspapers and official documents sold in the American Colonies.

text: The United States was founded in the year 1776.
The Boston Tea Party was a 1773 protest against British taxes in which colonists disguised as Mohawks dumped a valuable trade good into Boston Harbor.

front: A person who supported the British during the American Revolution.
